Package hospitalsystem.appointmentcontrol

Class AppointmentControl

java.lang.Object
hospitalsystem.appointmentcontrol.AppointmentControl
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminAppointmentControl, DoctorAppointmentControl, PatientAppointmentControl, PharmacistAppointmentControl
public class AppointmentControl extends Object
Base class providing core appointment management functionality for the hospital system. This class implements common utility methods used across different user roles for appointment retrieval, filtering, and management.
Since:
2024-11-19
Author:
Gracelynn, Leo

    • getAppointmentsByDoctorID

      public static List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByDoctorID(String doctorID)
      Retrieves all appointments associated with a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the unique identifier of the doctor
      Returns:
      a sorted list of appointments assigned to the specified doctor

    • getAppointmentsByPatientID

      public static List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByPatientID(String patientID)
      Retrieves all appointments for a specific patient.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the unique identifier of the patient
      Returns:
      a sorted list of appointments booked by the specified patient

    • getAppointmentByAppointmentID

      public static Appointment getAppointmentByAppointmentID(String appointmentID)
      Retrieves a specific appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - the unique identifier of the appointment
      Returns:
      the appointment matching the specified ID, or null if not found

    • getAvailableSlots

      public static List<Appointment> getAvailableSlots(Doctor doctor)
      Retrieves available appointment slots for a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor whose available slots are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a sorted list of available appointments

      Returns:

    • generateAppointmentID

      public static String generateAppointmentID(String doctorID, Appointment.AppointmentSlot slot)
      Generates a unique appointment ID based on doctor ID and appointment slot. Format: APT_[doctorID]_[YYYYMMDDHHMM]
      Parameters:
      doctorID - the doctor's unique identifier
      slot - the appointment slot containing date and time information
      Returns:
      a formatted appointment ID string

    • getAppointmentOutcomesString

      public static String getAppointmentOutcomesString(Patient patient, String gap)
      Generates a formatted string containing all appointment outcomes for a patient.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient whose appointment outcomes are to be retrieved
      gap - the string to use for indentation/spacing in the output
      Returns:
      a formatted string containing all appointment outcomes
